trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lebanon
There were no other sightings in Lebanon on or around July 22nd 2011
Summary: Multiple sightings nightly from campground.Bright lights appear from hillside then shoot off.One daaytime sighting of large white cylinder.
divs: sighting detailscamping last week at bennett springs and nightly we would witness large bright lights that would rise from the hillside.appeared very large and round at first then they would morph into a blinking cluster of orange \white blinking lights that would pass overhead. most were orange although one that appeared was large and very bright white in color.. i mentioned to my son that it was strange we never saw any air traffic during the daylight hours .at which time we both looked up and he spotted a large white cylinder approx. 1000 feet above our truck.no wings on the cylinder ,we watched for a few seconds and after a while it released a puff of white smoke or haze and disappeared !!! no sound accompanied the sightings .we watched them fly over us through night vision goggles and they looked like an orange flickering light that would go off and on quickly almost like a shutter on a camera .
